description: Aggregates on indexed data with search queries pertaining to particular fields. Requires permission to access the GetBucketsAggregation action.

parameters.name: bucketsAggregationType
parameters.description: The basic control of the response shape and the bucket aggregation type to perform. termsAggregation (dict) --- Performs an aggregation that will return a list of buckets. The list of buckets is a ranked list of the number of occurrences of an aggregation field value. maxBuckets (integer) --- The number of buckets to return in the response. Default to 10.

nested_params.name: termsAggregation
nested_params.description: Performs an aggregation that will return a list of buckets. The list of buckets is a ranked list of the number of occurrences of an aggregation field value.

nested_params.name: maxBuckets
nested_params.description: The number of buckets to return in the response. Default to 10.

nested_items.name: totalCount
nested_items.description: The total number of things that fit the query string criteria.

nested_items.name: buckets
nested_items.description: The main part of the response with a list of buckets. Each bucket contains a keyValue and a count.

nested_items.name: keyValue
nested_items.description: The value counted for the particular bucket.

nested_items.name: count
nested_items.description: The number of documents that have the value counted for the particular bucket.
